title: Reuters reveals from the Maldives to Venezuela: how Iran gets oil to an ally

The post Reuters reveals from the Maldives to Venezuela: how Iran gets oil to an ally appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported how, from the Maldives to Venezuela, Iran gets oil to an ally despite U.S. sanctions. The widening energy cooperation, which includes ship-to-ship transfers at remote spots in the Indian Ocean, is helping cash-strapped Venezuela obtain supplies to convert its extra heavy oil and boost exports.Â 

The post Reuters reveals from the Maldives to Venezuela: how Iran gets oil to an ally appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
